Changes in Version 0.4.0.9002 (2020-02-27)

  • metric.score.R
    • Account for “no organisms collected”.
      • TAXAID needs to be “NONE”.
      • N_TAXA needs to be zero.
      • Both bugs and fish will exclude all other N_TAXA = 0 but keep if TAXAID == “NONE”.
      • nt_total metric has condition for N_TAXA > 0.
      • All other metrics will calculate but receive values of 0, NA, or NaN as appropriate.
